description: Dashboard to visualize metrics captured by App Metrics ASP.NET Core Middleware 1.2.0, tested with App.Metrics.Extensions.Reporting.ElasticSearch 1.1.0  - http://app-metrics.io/

targets.query: name:application.httprequests__transactions AND tags.env:$environment AND tags.app:$application AND tags.server:$server
